mapper.insert:
insert into t_electric_data (circuitId, electricityA, electricityB, electricityC, voltageA, voltageB, voltageC, activePower, reactivePower, apparentPower, powerFactor, electricEnergy, time) values
(#{item.circuitId}, #{item.electricityA}, #{item.electricityB}, #{item.electricityC}, #{item.voltageA}, #{item.voltageB}, #{item.voltageC}, #{item.activePower}, #{item.reactivePower}, #{item.apparentPower}, #{item.powerFactor}, #{item.electricEnergy}, #{item.time})
mapper.select: select * from t_electric_data where circuitId = #{cid} and `time` >= #{start} and `time` <= #{end}
